divs: Sighting Details This was told to me after I got home from work, my grand daughter heard our dog barking out of the basement door which is glass. she let him out and he went to the edge of the fenced yard and looked up barking at this thing, my grand daughter said she saw an enormous round object,it covered the sky where she was and its main body was orange, and she described it as having star shapes all around the thing, which I think was just the way the lights looked on the edge of the thing, she is 10 and she didnt say look I saw a ufo, she never has really heard of anything like a ufo, anyway she said it just disappeared and then reapeared a ways off before it disappeared behind the trees, she said it was never up in the sky, just over the tree line and not very far away. I asked her to draw a picture of it and it was as she described it. I know she saw it. I would like to know if anyone else saw this in the southeast kentucky area.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around June 14th 2008
Summary: orange main body, with colored lights
